description:
Intelligent market analysis and trading system for digital asset age.
The most powerful trading analysis system in the current digital currency trading environment, comes with the Web-based and desktop-based digital currency analysis tools IntelliChart and IntelliScript.

The beta version will be released in May 2018;with APIs and inter-exchange set up, users can easily use BitStation to analyze, test trading strategies and execute automatic trading orders including smart order routing across major exchanges. Users can show off their track records and share their own trading strategies on the platform to the communities to receive contribution or BSTN rewards.
name: BitStation
